reviews.review: This movie was amazing all I’m gone say.....

Thanos has the depth of a frying pan and Marvel quickly resorts to shock value in order to make the audience despise him. Killing off the franchises most popular characters (one of which in the first few minutes) causes the attempted humor to fall flat and Marvel's usual charm to sink down to the level of DC's depressing grittiness. Definitely not what I've come to expect from Marvel's usually colorful and witty cinematic universe.

Wow, the movie isn't light hearted like other Marvel movies.  The ending was a shock. I really think they did a great job fitting all the characters and their stories into the movie. The flow was good even with all the stars. Want to see it again and of course cant wait for the sequel!
Best Avengers movie by far.  Top 3 in MCU.

Avengers: Infinity War is the culmination of 10 years worth of storytelling, character building and franchise molding that will go down in history. With a premise that puts everything at stake (and I mean EVERYTHING) and a cast more than qualified, Infinity War boasts an amazing film score, amazing cinematography and an ending that either breaks you or leaves you with your jaw open. While it is a love letter to fans, the pacing occasionally felt unbalanced and sometimes the constant switching of group focus could get confusing. However, Marvel handled a giant cast of heroes with elegance and finnese, bringing to life a villain who leaves all other marvel villains in the dust. Infinity War is a film to cherish, praise and share.

It's a mediocrely good film.
Made me cry, made me laugh, it is made  really well but at times its cringeworthy and boaring. 
Some polishing to do but its stil good.

This movie was amazing. BRILLIANT escapism: what most people want from their blockbuster titles. Worth every penny. As a matter of fact, going to see it again in theater, and will DEFINITELY buy the BluRay
The most amazing movie EVER!! You don’t even have to watch all ten movies to appreciate this film
This is an incredible movie.  I was a little worried how they'd be able to squeeze so many characters and storylines into this 2 part Infiniry War but they pulled it off.
The film surpassed all my expectations because it made me experience aStorm of contradictory emotions, my eyes were usually filled with tears, I will definitely go again
